name: Stella Deus: The Gate of Eternity
synopsis: As a deadly mist called the "miasma" spreads across the land, you must guide a team of characters on a mission to save the world. Get ready to embark on a quest that has you hunting spirits, battling enemies, and ultimately opening the fabled Gate of Eternity. Effectively manage your characters and inventory to launch powerful attacks. Stella Deus: The Gate of Eternity offers more than 50 hours of tactical gameplay, including side quests.
